nodes.text: Ewoks Join the Fight is a young-reader book in the World of Reading series by Disney–Lucasfilm Press. It retells events from Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi with a focus on the Ewoks. Written by Michael Siglain with illustrations by Pilot Studio, the title is a canon retelling of the events from the 1983 children's storybook.

Luke, Han, and Princess Leia make unlikely friends with the furry Ewoks of Endor. This level 1 early reader retells classic scenes from Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi as the Ewoks join the rebellion against the evil Galactic Empire. Featuring beautiful full-color illustrations, this World of Reading book is perfect for little Star Wars fans who are ready to read on their own.
The World of Reading edition of Ewoks Join the Fight is one of three titles included in the compilation book 3 Out-of-This-World Tales!, released on August 29, 2017.
